dmca.title: born-again-christian complains of copying
dmca.body:
I, [private], am the sole owner of the website
born-again-christian.info, which has had original copyright material
authored by me taken from it without permission and posted illegally on
webpages listed in Google.com. In addition to copyright infringement,
our legitimate copyright notice has been removed in violation of
International Copyright Law, and US Federal Law. Please remove all the
infringing pages from your index immediately, and kindly reply to:
[private]@born-again-christian.info 
Confirming your compliance with our request in accordance with DMCA
1998.

Here follow details of the infringements:
The infringing pages can be found in Google using search terms:
"royouth.com Halloween's Satanic Roots"
The following pages contain the infringing material:
http://www.royouth.com/forums/showthread.php?t=6690
http://www.royouth.com/forums/printthread.php?t=6690
http://www.royouth.com/forums/archive/index.php/t-6690.html
http://www.royouth.com/forums/showthread.php?t=6992&goto=nextnewest
Infringer: Royouth.com [private]@royouth.com
The copyrighted work at issue is the copyright text that appears on our
website here:
Halloween's Satanic Roots Exposed
http://www.born-again-christian.info/christian.view.of.halloween.htm

Statutory Declaration:
I, [private], have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted
materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not
authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.
I declare*, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the
notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am
authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is
allegedly infringed.
*NOTE: I am a Christian missionary, God's Word specifically commands me
NOT to swear, just let your yes be yes. (Holy Bible, James 5:12; 'But
above all things, my brethren, swear not, neither by heaven, neither by
the earth, neither by any other oath: but let your yea be yea; and your
nay, nay; lest ye fall into condemnation.') Therefore I don't swear
anything, I simply declare the above to be true.

SIGNED: [private]
DATE: 29th Jan 2006
